\\ This paper presents Genpex, which is a system for generating narrative exercises for expressing probability problems. Genpex was created in the context of an international project on item generation for testing student competencies in solving probability problems. Automatic item generation is an effective way of constructing many items with controlled difficulties, based on a set of predefined task parameters (Enright et al., 2002; Deane and Sheehan, 2003; Arendasy et al., 2006; Holling et al., 2009).
